message.content:
The generated code only implements the user registration feature (1.1 Sign up using email) of the Global Chat Service. The other features such as forgotten password recovery, user profile management, contact management, messaging, group chats, status/story feature, web application, and connectivity and offline mode are not implemented in the generated code.

Plan: To implement the remaining features, I will create additional endpoints in the Flask application for each feature. For example, for the forgotten password recovery feature, I will create an endpoint that accepts a user's email and sends a password reset link to that email. For the user profile management feature, I will create endpoints that allow users to set their profile pictures and status messages, and adjust their privacy settings. I will follow a similar approach for the remaining features. I will also write tests for each endpoint to ensure they work as expected.
